projects and Order Activity by Project
section.para: To view order activity by project, go to CRM > Reports > Order Activity by Project. The following screen will appear:
When displaying order activity by project, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select a project number whose order activity you want to display.
Specify which order type information you want to include in the display:
Select to include details for any sales orders linked to the project.
Select to include details for any work orders linked to the project.
Select to include details for any purchase orders linked to the project.

tip.para: Some projects may not allow all order types to be assigned to them. If that is the case, you will not see information displayed for all order types.

listitem.para: Display lists orders associated with the selected project, using the specified parameters.
